properties.name: contactCreateNotice
properties.displayName: Create a new contact or update an existing one if email or phone matches (upsert)

properties.name: email
properties.description: Email or Phone are required to create contact

properties.name: phone
properties.description: Phone or Email are required to create contact. Phone number has to start with a valid country code leading with + sign.

values.name: fieldId
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: dnd
options.description: Whether automated/manual outbound messages are permitted to go out or not. True means NO outbound messages are permitted.

options.name: name
options.description: The full name of the contact, will be overwritten by 'First Name' and 'Last Name' if set

options.name: tags
options.hint: Comma separated list of tags, array of strings can be set in expression

options.name: timezone
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify a timezone using an expression

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: query
options.description: Query will search on these fields: Name, Phone, Email, Tags, and Company Name

properties.name: email
properties.description: Lookup Contact by Email. If Email is not found it will try to find a contact by phone.

properties.name: phone
properties.description: Lookup Contact by Phone. It will first try to find a contact by Email and than by Phone.

options.name: Get Free Slots
options.action: Get free slots of a calendar

options.name: appointmentStatus
options.description: The status of the appointment. Allowed values: new, confirmed, cancelled, showed, noshow, invalid.

properties.name: startDate
properties.description: The start date for fetching free calendar slots. Example: 1548898600000.

properties.name: endDate
properties.description: The end date for fetching free calendar slots. Example: 1601490599999.

options.name: timezone
options.description: The timezone to use for the returned slots. Example: America/Chihuahua.

options.name: userId
options.description: User ID to filter the slots (optional)

options.name: userIds
options.description: Comma-separated list of user IDs to filter the slots

options.name: enableLookBusy
options.description: Apply Look Busy to the slots
